As an overview , this proposal : * Maintains the basic Gas Accord structure in place today for the period 2003 to 2007 . *	SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R
* Offers end user transportation rates for 2003 lower for most customers than rates in effect today . *	SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R
* Provides for vintaged Redwood path rates for core customers . *	SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R
* Offers a 7.5 cent / dth rate to large customers while minimizing rate changes to other customers , minimizing the incentive for these customers to seek to bypass local transmission charges and other CPUC - approved charges . *	SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R
* Adopts guidelines to improve reliability and help moderate prices in gas commodity markets , and identifies the capital projects needed to meet these guidelines over the course of the GA II period ( 2003 - 2007 ) . *	SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R
* Provides a high degree of rate stability , with a 3.5 % escalator to capture both inflation and the cost of needed capital projects . In our Constitutional system , we have three branches of the Federal Government : the Legislative , Executive , and Judicial branches .	SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R
And the basic idea behind the Checks and Balances we have is that if one branch of the Government goes crazy , the other two can hold it down .	SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R
But Samuel Alito believes in a little - known Constitutional theory - called the " Unitary Executive Theory " - which says that the President should have complete control over the Executive Branch , and that the Executive Branch should be in charge of almost everything that the Government actually does , including the functions of the Independent Agencies which were designed to be free of Presidential control , and the Military , which exists , which is regulated , and which is funded by specific authority given by the Constitution to Congress , not to the President . 1 ) The Italian Renaissance began the opening phase of the Renaissance , a period of great cultural change and achievement in Europe that spanned the period from the end of the 13th century to about 1600 , marking the transition between Medieval and Early Modern Europe .	SHIFT SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R SHIFT ARC_L ARC_L ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R ARC_R SHIFT ARC_R ARC_R

Although the origins of a movement that was confined largely to the literate culture of intellectual endeavor and patronage can be traced to the earlier part of the 14th century , many aspects of Italian culture and society remained largely Medieval ; the Renaissance did not come into full swing until the end of the century . The word renaissance ( Rinascimento in Italian ) means “ rebirth ” , and the era is best known for the renewed interest in the culture of classical antiquity after the period that Renaissance humanists labelled the Dark Ages .
